creditline: Gift of Maureen and Terry White
description: roughly heart-shaped, flat pillow with maroon velvet center; taupe, white, blue, yellow and amber beads; flower at top center with large leaves on right and left lobes of shape; small flower motifs at bottom and along leaf stems; "FROM / NIAGARA / FALLS / 1901" in center
object_name: Pillow form whimsey in the form of a heart
title: Pillow form whimsey in the form of a heart
